data.title: Jill Hennessy Height
data.meta_description: Jill Hennessy height is 5ft 7  or 170.2 cm tall. Discover more Celebrity Heights and Vote on how tall you think any Celebrity is!
data.text:
Nik said on 27/Jan/18

She is probably about 5'7", no more and no less!

Ian C. said on 26/Jan/18

And she's a twin. There are two of her. It's as if God had thought, that was a good one, and hit the replay button.

Adolfus said on 13/Mar/16

Clearly 5'8".

Arch Stanton said on 6/May/15

Yeah, also films Exit Wounds, RoboCop 3, Most Wanted, Autumn in New York, Chutney Popcorn and The Acting Class.

Arch Stanton said on 6/May/15

Rob can you also mention Exit Wounds? For Seagal!

Arch Stanton said on 7/Aug/14

She looks a solid 5'7" er to me, can't see under 5 ft 7. Incredibly attractive.

Dmeyer said on 6/Aug/14

Thanks rob a 5'8 girl plus 6cm heels is 179cm barely 5cm under A 181.5cm with 2.5cm shoes on she looks Max 5'9-9.5 heels on she is 5'7 at most or 169cm but 5'7 listing is much better

Dmeyer said on 5/Aug/14

Rob with a solid 1.25in more shoes than 5'11.5 alec Baldwin she looks 5'7.5-8in i think she is tops 5'6.5-7in look at her rob she could be a full in under your listing

Editor Rob

I saw her with Kat Graham and yeah 5ft 7 might be most

Dmeyer said on 5/Aug/14

Alec b is 3.5in taller than her 3in heels on alec 6ft 0.5in shoes minus 5.5in 5'7 is closer

Miiiiiiighty_- said on 27/Jul/14

Tall girl wouldn't have thought she was this tall because she has very nice body proportions

Anonymous said on 23/Nov/08

She's shorter than Leslie Bibb when Leslie costared on Crossing Jordan.

glenn said on 31/Dec/07

im surprised i never scanned this.

saddas said on 31/Dec/07

i saw her at lax in los angeles and she seemed pretty tall. i'm 5'10 and she was slightly shorter. she had on boots so maybe 5'9. i also think she has a twin sister so i'm not sure if it was even her or not.

PJ said on 12/Dec/07

I've seen her several times in NYC and at Sundance, she's not quite 5'8.

Anonymous said on 19/Oct/07

5'7" according to People Magazine
